availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Allen Lindsay (Scott Co., KY hotel keeper)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, hotel keeper and tavern keeper. Clark County, Kentucky, native. Son of Charles Lindsay and Melinda Lindsay. Married to Rebecca Scott Lindsay in Clark County, Kentucky, on April 16, 1851. Owned one enslaved person in Scott County, Kentucky in 1860. Father of Daniel Scott Lindsay, Nannie Cunningham Lindsay, and Willie Lindsay. Hotel keeper in Scott County in 1860. Tavern keeper in Fayette County in 1865.
